Text: howdy from TylerHi Jay I can only begin to imagine how stressed things must be for you right now Jerril and I have our fingers crossed that things work out OK for you during the transition Hopefully the people at Dynegy will recognize what a smart honest and harworking guy you are and reward you appropriately If you ever want to vent let me know Sometimes big sisters arent always bossy and can even be helpful Love Meg Meg Reitmeyer and Jerril Burnette
